task_description: extracting CustomerPhoneType data from Oracle server to AWS S3

source.query:
SELECT 
    P."BUSINESSENTITYID",
    "PERSONTYPE",
    "TITLE",
    "FIRSTNAME",
    "MIDDLENAME",
    "LASTNAME",
    "SUFFIX",
    "EMAILPROMOTION",
    "DEMOGRAPHICS",
    "ROWGUID",
    PC."CUSTOMER_TYPE_NAME",
    PC."PHONENUMBER",
    PC."PHONE_NUMBER_TYP",
    PC."CUSTOMER_TYPE_MODIFIEDDATE"
FROM 
    "LND"."CUSTOMER" P
RIGHT JOIN 
    (SELECT 
    "BUSINESSENTITYID",
    "PHONENUMBER",
    PP."PHONENUMBERTYPEID",
    PP."MODIFIEDDATE",
    PN."NAME" AS "PHONE_NUMBER_TYP",
    CT."CONTACTTYPEID",
    CT."NAME" AS "CUSTOMER_TYPE_NAME",
    CT."MODIFIEDDATE" AS "CUSTOMER_TYPE_MODIFIEDDATE"
FROM 
    "LND"."CUSTOMER_PHONE" PP
LEFT JOIN 
    "LND"."CUSTOMER_PHONE_TYPE" PN 
ON 
    PP."PHONENUMBERTYPEID" = PN."PHONENUMBERTYPEID"
LEFT JOIN 
    "LND"."CUSTOMER_TYPE" CT 
ON 
    PN."PHONENUMBERTYPEID" = CT."CONTACTTYPEID") PC
ON 
    P."BUSINESSENTITYID" = PC."BUSINESSENTITYID"
